SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETACTIVELYSPONSOREDCHILDREN_FORSPONSOR
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get all Active Children that are sponsored by the given sponsor.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETACTIVELYSPONSOREDCHILDREN_FORSPONSOR ( -- Add the parameters for the function here @sponsorId uniqueidentifier ) returns @SponsoredChildrenTable TABLE ( -- Add the column definitions for the TABLE variable here childId uniqueidentifier ) with execute as caller as begin -- Fill the table variable with the rows for your result set insert @SponsoredChildrenTable select soc.id from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = soc.ID where s.CONSTITUENTID = @sponsorId and s.STATUSCODE = 1 and soc.ID is not null
return end
